mapper.insert: insert into CAR_MODEL_INFO( CAR_COMP, MODEL_CODE, MODEL_NM, CAR_KIND, CAR_OUTLINE, CAR_FURE, CAR_MSN ) values( #{carComp}, #{modelCode}, #{modelNm}, #{carKind}, #{carOutline}, #{carFure}, #{carMsn} )
mapper.select: select CODE as code, CODE_NM as codeNm from CMMN_CODE where 1=1 AND GRP_CODE = 'CAR' AND PARENT_CODE = 'CAR_COMP' AND USE_AT = 'Y'

select CODE as code, CODE_NM as codeNm from CMMN_CODE where 1=1 AND GRP_CODE = 'CAR' AND PARENT_CODE = 'CAR_KIND'
AND CODE = #{code}
AND CODE_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{codeNm} , '%' )
AND USE_AT = 'Y' ORDER BY SORT
